text: Heinrich XLII (1752–1818) was a German prince of the House of Reuss. ==Biography== He succeeded as Count of Reuss-Schleiz on 25 June 1784, and also to Reuss-Gera on 26 April 1802, when the counties were united as Reuss-Schleiz und Gera. On 9 April 1806 the united county was raised to a principality.http://www.worldstatesmen.org/German_States4.html ==References== Category:1752 births Category:1818 deaths Category:People from Schleiz Category:Princes of Reuss
title: Heinrich XLII, Prince Reuss-Schleiz und Gera
